entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:18 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
